dict.string: SkateConnect uses the camera to scan QR codes to enhance user experience with AR features.
SkateConnect uses the microphone for voice commands to facilitate user interaction with our AI assistant feature.
SkateConnect uses the photo library to allow users to upload profile pictures.
SkateConnect uses your location to provide location-based services, such as finding nearby locations.
SkateConnect uses your location even when the app is in the background to offer continuous location-based services, like tracking your journey.
